mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.eventid AS "eventid", a.eventname AS "eventname", a.eventdescription AS "eventdescription", a.due_date AS "dueDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_event a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.eventid LIKE '%'||#{eventid}||'%' '%'+#{eventid}+'%' concat('%',#{eventid},'%')
AND a.eventname LIKE '%'||#{eventname}||'%' '%'+#{eventname}+'%' concat('%',#{eventname},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_event( id, eventid, eventname, eventdescription, due_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{eventid}, #{eventname}, #{eventdescription}, #{dueDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_event SET eventid = #{eventid}, eventname = #{eventname}, eventdescription = #{eventdescription}, due_date = #{dueDate}, create_by = #{createBy.id}, create_date = #{createDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
